title: Today's FBI
overview: Ben Slater, a veteran of 20 years in the Bureau, leads a team of four outstanding agents: Nick, an ardent youth who excels in undercover jobs; Al, an athletic operative; Dwayne, an ex-navy agent; and Maggie, a psychologist who also knows to handle a gun. The team's target: organized crime tough guys, mad religious leaders, pornographers, corrupt businessmen.
